fko.tetris.AI

Class TrainerBot

  • java.lang.Object
    • fko.tetris.AI.AbstractBot
      • fko.tetris.AI.TrainerBot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bot, Runnable

    public class TrainerBot
extends AbstractBot
    This implementation creates a TrainingSet file for training a Neural Network later.
    A Bot capable of looking several Tetriminos ahead using the NextQueue
    It evaluates absolute height, aggregated height, unevenness, holes, blocker (Minos over holes).
    It can't play with a lookahead of 3+ in higher levels (12+) as it takes too long to calculate.
    TODO: Optimize performance to be able to look ahead more TODO: Use LOCK moves to lose holes (side movements when Tetrimino locks) TODO: Optimize for Score instead only height
